original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: US President Donald Trump expresses a desire to broker a peace deal between Russia and Ukraine, suggesting it could secure his place in heaven, as he pushes for direct negotiations between Vladimir Putin and Vladimir Zelensky. Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov confirms that Putin is ready to meet Zelensky once all issues related to the conflict settlement are worked out.</s>
